hero.title: Scale Your Platform with Our API
hero.description: Integrate AI-powered home staging directly into your real estate platform, marketplace, or agency workflow — process unlimited images at scale.

features.title: Lightning Fast
features.description: Process thousands of property photos hourly with our optimized AI infrastructure, ensuring same-day delivery for even the largest real estate portfolios.

features.title: Enterprise Security
features.description: With SOC 2 compliance and end-to-end encryption, your property data and client information remain completely secure.

features.title: Auto-Scaling
features.description: Handle high volumes of photographs seamlessly without performance loss — from 10 to 10,000+ images daily with consistent speed.

items.title: Real Estate Platforms
items.subtitle: Automate real estate photo enhancement for listing platforms.
items.description: Tired of inconsistent, low-quality listings that hurt your platform's credibility? Integrate AI-powered staging to instantly upgrade every property photo uploaded by your users. Boost listing quality at scale, increase user engagement, and make your marketplace more visually appealing to serious buyers.

items.title: Real Estate Agencies
items.subtitle: Give your agents powerful staging tools integrated into their workflow.
items.description: Empower your agents to win more listings and sell faster. Instead of expensive physical staging, provide a cost-effective digital staging tool that helps them transform cluttered photos into dream homes in seconds, directly within their workflow.

items.title: Property Marketplaces
items.subtitle: Offer premium staging as a value-added service to your sellers.
items.description: Differentiate your marketplace and create a new revenue stream. Offer premium AI staging as an upsell service to your sellers. A beautifully staged home sells faster, making your platform more effective and generating commission-sharing opportunities for you.

items.title: Photography Studios
items.subtitle: Add AI staging to your real estate photography packages.
items.description: Expand your service portfolio and increase your average order value. Add AI virtual staging to your photography packages to offer clients a complete "shoot-and-stage" solution, saving them time and money on traditional staging.

cta.title: Ready to Get Started?
cta.description: Need high-volume or customized API access?
